statements: SELECT * FROM CustomerPreferences WHERE age > 30;
SELECT customer_id, name, travel_preferences FROM CustomerPreferences WHERE gender = 'female';
SELECT booking_id, total_price FROM BookingHistory WHERE total_price > 1000;
SELECT * FROM TravelItineraries WHERE status = 'confirmed' ORDER BY itinerary_date DESC;
SELECT customer_id, booking_date, destination FROM BookingHistory WHERE destination LIKE '%beach%';
SELECT * FROM CustomerPreferences;
SELECT name, age, gender FROM CustomerPreferences WHERE age > 30;
SELECT destination, total_price FROM BookingHistory WHERE total_price > 1000 ORDER BY total_price DESC;
SELECT booking_id, destination FROM BookingHistory JOIN TravelItineraries ON BookingHistory.booking_id = TravelItineraries.booking_id;

SELECT customer_id, name, status FROM CustomerPreferences JOIN BookingHistory ON CustomerPreferences.customer_id = BookingHistory.customer_id JOIN TravelItineraries ON BookingHistory.booking_id = TravelItineraries.booking_id WHERE status = 'Confirmed';
SELECT * FROM customer_preferences ORDER BY name ASC;
SELECT customer_id, email FROM customer_preferences WHERE phone_number LIKE '%555%'
SELECT * FROM customer_preferences WHERE name='John Doe';
SELECT MAX(total_amount) FROM booking_history;
SELECT booking_id, customer_id, booking_date FROM booking_history ORDER BY booking_date DESC;
SELECT * FROM customer_preferences WHERE customer_id = 1;
SELECT name, email FROM customer_preferences ORDER BY email DESC;
SELECT booking_id, booking_date, total_amount FROM booking_history WHERE total_amount > 1000 ORDER BY booking_date ASC;
SELECT customer_id, email, phone_number FROM customer_preferences WHERE email LIKE '%gmail.com';
SELECT * FROM booking_history WHERE booking_date BETWEEN '2021-01-01' AND '2021-12-31';
SELECT * FROM customer_preferences;
SELECT name, email FROM customer_preferences WHERE age > 30;
SELECT customer_id, email, phone_number FROM customer_preferences ORDER BY email DESC;
SELECT * FROM booking_history WHERE amount_paid > 500.00;
SELECT booking_id, destination, booking_date FROM booking_history WHERE booking_date BETWEEN '2021-01-01' AND '2021-03-31';
SELECT * FROM customer_preferences WHERE age > 30 ORDER BY name DESC;
SELECT customer_id, name, email, phone_number FROM customer_preferences WHERE customer_id = 1001;
SELECT booking_id, destination FROM booking_history WHERE amount_paid > 500 ORDER BY booking_date ASC;
SELECT * FROM travel_itineraries WHERE start_date > '2022-01-01' AND end_date < '2022-12-31';
SELECT booking_id, destination, amount_paid FROM booking_history WHERE amount_paid BETWEEN 100 AND 1000 ORDER BY destination, amount_paid DESC;
SELECT * FROM customers;
SELECT full_name, email FROM customers WHERE customer_id = 1;
SELECT destination_name, price_per_person FROM destinations ORDER BY price_per_person DESC;
SELECT booking_id, customer_id, total_price FROM bookings WHERE total_price > 1000;
SELECT * FROM itineraries WHERE travel_date BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-01-31';
SELECT * FROM customers ORDER BY full_name DESC;
SELECT booking_id, booking_date, total_price FROM bookings WHERE total_price > 1000;
SELECT destination_name, description FROM destinations WHERE destination_id IN (1, 3, 5);
SELECT full_name, email, phone_number FROM customers WHERE email LIKE '%gmail.com';

SELECT c.full_name, d.destination_name, i.travel_date FROM customers c INNER JOIN bookings b ON c.customer_id = b.customer_id INNER JOIN itineraries i ON i.booking_id = b.booking_id INNER JOIN destinations d ON d.destination_id = i.destination_id ORDER BY i.travel_date ASC;
SELECT * FROM customer_preferences;
SELECT name, email, preferred_destination FROM customer_preferences WHERE customer_id = 1001;
SELECT booking_id, customer_id, amount FROM booking_history ORDER BY amount DESC;
SELECT feedback_id, rating, comments FROM customer_feedback WHERE rating >= 4;
SELECT agent_id, name, email, phone_number FROM travel_agents WHERE name LIKE 'A%';
SELECT name, email, phone_number FROM customer_preferences WHERE preferred_destination='Beach'
SELECT * FROM booking_history WHERE booking_date >= '2022-01-01' ORDER BY amount DESC
SELECT DISTINCT destination FROM travel_itineraries
SELECT feedback_id, rating, comments FROM customer_feedback WHERE rating > 4 ORDER BY feedback_id ASC
SELECT * FROM travel_agents
